name: Trade Secret
description:
In Trade Secret, 2-4 players take turns dealing in the black market in order to be the richest person. The goal of the game is to be first person to have 60 gold coins through selling artifacts and other means.

Play: https://playingcards.io/4cs6bk

To create a new room: Download the Trade_Secret_Final.pcio file. Go to playingcards.io and create a custom room. Edit the table and go to room options. Finally, press "import from file" and import the downloaded file.
